en-US.summary: Guess a number, and Alexa will tell you if you need to guess higher or lower.
examplePhrases: Alexa ask high low game is it {number}
en-US.name: High Low Game
en-US.description: Guess a number, and Alexa will tell you if you need to guess higher or lower. She will also tell you how many times you have played.
